title: The Night Manager, Season 1 - The Night Manager
text:

If iBooks doesn't open, click the iBooks app in your Dock. Progress Indicator iTunes iTunes is the world's easiest way to organize and add to your digital media collection. Already have iTunes? Click I Have iTunes to open it now. The Night Manager, Season 1 HD TV-MA Closed Captioning Open iTunes to preview or buy TV shows. Description The Night Manager is based on John le Carre's novel, ex-British soldier Jonathan Pine (Tom Hiddleston) is recruited by MI-6's Angela Burr (Olivia Colman) to infiltrate the inner circle of an arms trader named Richard Onslow Roper (Hugh Laurie).
